title: Verify the use case
'Place Order' button is display
custom_steps:
Scenario: Clicking the 'Place Order' button  
Given a user is on the game ticket selection page             
When the user selects the ticket     
And the user adds payment details                                                                
Then the user should be able to click the 'Place Order' button

title: Digital Delivery Method is a unique option
custom_steps:
Scenario: Seeing the Digital Delivery Method
Given a user is on the game ticket selection page 
When the user selects the ticket                                                             
And the user adds payment details  
Then the user should be able to see Dijital Delivery Method

title: Ticket sales is not purchased without card details
custom_steps:
Scenario: Having the payment card details
Given a user is on the game ticket selection page               
When the user selects a ticket                                                             
And the user doesn't add card details                                                                
Then the user shouldn't be able to complete the transaction

title: Ticket sales is not purchased with invalid Amex card  digit details
custom_steps:
Scenario: Purchasing  valid card digits with Amex 
Given a user is on the game ticket selection page     
When the user selects the ticket                                                             
And user chooses Amex  and adds the card number                                                            
Then the user should add 15 digits card number

title: Invalid email address does not complete the transaction
custom_steps:
Scenario: Purchasing with an invalid email address 
Given a user is on the checkout page
When a user adds an invalid (not exist) email address
Then the user shouldn't be able to complete the transaction

title: Expired ticket is not selecting
custom_steps:
Scenario: Selecting an expired ticket 
Given a user is on the game ticket selection page               
When the user selects the ticket   
Then the user shouldn't be able to select the expired date event

title: Beeing able to creating account  through the confirmation email for purchased ticket
custom_steps:
Scenario: Create an account through the confirmation email with the email provided in the guest checkout
Given user purchased the ticket with the guest checkout option
When the user gets the confirmation email for the ticket 
Then the user should be able to create an account

title: Empty card checkout is completing the transaction
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verification of the checkout with empty card details
Given the user is on the checkout page 
When a user is leaving empty payment card details
Then the user shouldn't be able to complete the transaction

title: User should enable to choose the seat
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verification eligibility of for selecting a seat
Given a user is on the game ticket selection page 
When the user selects the desired ticket  
Then the user should be able to select the available ticket

title: User should be able to edit the ticket without losing all the payment details that added
custom_steps:
Scenario: Editing the tickets without losing the payment details added
Given a user is on the checkout page
When a user decides to go back to the ticket selection page
And if the user wants to edit the desired ticket
The user's payment detail that was added should not go away

title: Zipcode provided on billing information should be valid and 5 digits for USA
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verification of the zip code provided in the billing information
Given the user is on the checkout page
When the user provides the billing information
And the user adds the zip code 
Then the zip code should be valid and 5 digits for USA

title: Removing the ticket from the shopping card one by one
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verification of the desired ticket in the shopping cart once the user removed one
Given a user is on the game ticket selection page 
When a user clicks the shopping card
And user removes one ticket that is not wanted
Then the user should be able to see other selected tickets are exist

title: As a user I want to be able to see the total cost, including all prices, taxes, and fees before checkout
custom_steps:
Scenario: Users should see the total cost, including all prices, taxes, and fees
Given user on the checkout page to do purchasing the ticket
When a user is provide the payment details
Then the user should be able to see the total cost, including all prices, taxes, and fees

title: First name and last name can not be empty
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verification of first name and last name can not be completed if it is empty
Given the user is on the checkout page
When the user leaves their first name and last name empty
Then the user should get a warning message

title: First name and last name can be only letter
custom_steps:
Scenario: First name and last name required to be the only letter
Given the user is on the checkout page
When a user adds a number or symbol to the first and last name 
Then the user should get a warning message

title: Phone number is required to be 10 digits
custom_steps:
Scenario: First name and last name required to be the only letter
Given the user is on the checkout page
When the user adds the phone number
Then the user can be able to add only 10 digits

title: Guest seat selection error handling
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify user can select the seat that is sold 
Given the user is on the ticket selection page 
When the user selects the desired seat
Then the seat already reserved or sold should not be selected anymore

title: Guest checkout security
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that guest checkout payment detail is secure the way to store
Given the user complete the checkout 
When the user creates the account through the confirmation email 
Then sensitive payment information should not be stored visible(plaintext format)

title: User should enable to download ticket from confirmation email
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify user should download the ticket through the confirmation email
Given a user completed the checkout 
When a user opens the confirmation email and clicks the ticket
Then a user should be able to download the ticket

title: The system should retain the information added before user closed the browser by mistake
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify guest checkout abandonment 
Given a user started the guest checkout process
When a user close the browser or navigate different page
And when the user returns to the page
Then the system should have the information that was added previously

title: Confirmation page should appear after completing transaction
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify user can see the confirmation page
Given user completed the checkout
When a user clicks "Place Order" button
And user completes the order
The confirmation page should appear

title: User should buy the ticket with his credit/debit card
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify user can purchase a ticket with not own card
Given the user is on the guest checkout page
When a user purchases the ticket with somebody else is credited/
debit card
Then the user should be able to create an account through the 
confirmation email under his/her own name
Then user should be able to change his name on the delivery details

title: Guest checkout flow should display after creating the account
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify the user can see the ticket flow after creating an account through the confirmation email
Given: the user is on the confirmation email to see the purchased ticket
When a user wants to create through the confirmation email
And user creates an account
Then the user should be able to see the guest checkout flow

title: Guest checkout payments methods
custom_steps:
Scenario:Verify user can see multiple payment methods
Given user is on checkout page
When user reach the payment step
Then user should see the Discover, Master Card, Amex and Visa payment card

title: User should accept the terms and condition button
custom_steps:
Scenario:Verify he terms and condition button 
Given user is on checkout page
When user proceed to the final step before placing the order
Then user should not be able to complete without clicking terms and condition button

title: Order summary is required to be correct
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the transaction number should be correct
Given the user is on the checkout page
When the user reviews the transaction number after placing the order
Then the order summary should display the correct transaction number

title: Upsell is possible
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify guest checkout display upsell 
Given the user is on the checkout page
When the user reviews cart items before placing the order
Then the system should display relevant upsell option

title: Browser compatibility is required
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify guest checkout browser compatibility
Given the user is using Chrome web browsers
When a user completes the guest checkout process using each browser
Then the checkout process should function correctly and consistently

title: Guest checkout  mobile responsiveness for each device
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify the guest checkout response for various devices
Given the user access to the website on various mobile devices
When the user completes the guest checkout process using each device
Then the checkout process should be fully responsive and easy to use

title: Gift Options is displayed
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify Guest Checkout Gift Options
Given the user on the guest checkout page
When the user chooses the order as a gift
Then the user should be able to add a personalized message

title: Guest checkout support contact information is displayed
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify Guest checkout support contact information
Given the user on the guest checkout page
When the user faces a technical issue during the checkout process
Then the page should provide clear and accessible support contact information

title: Guest checkout order should be avaliable cancelation
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify Guest checkout order can be canceled 
Given the user completed the guest checkout process
When the user requests to cancel the order within the specified order
Then the system should process the cancelation
And refund the appropriate amount according to the refund policy

title: Guest checkout fraud detection
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify the system avoid fraud due to the transaction
Given the user is on the Guest checkout page
When the user enters the payment information
Then the system should perform fraud detection checks
And flag the suspicious transaction for further review

title: Guest checkout save cart for later
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify Guest checkout will be able to save the ticket in the cart for later 
Given the user added items to the cart as a guest user 
When the user chooses to save the cart for later 
Then the system should be able to keep it for later (with the unique link)

title: Applying a gift card for a Guest checkout
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify the gift card added on checkout is deducted
Given the user is on the checkout page 
When the user has a valid gift card 
And apply for the gift card during checkout 
Then the gift card amount should be deducted from the order
total

title: Guest checkout auto-fill should work for information
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify Guest checkout auto-fill information
Given the user completed previously the guest checkout process
When the user starts a new guest checkout
Then the system should offer auto-fill for saved information(billing)

title: Guest checkout age verification
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify guest checkout age verification
Given the user is on the guest checkout page
When the user attempts the age-restricted ticket
Then the system should not allow the proceed checkout

title: Guest checkout should be empty cart after the order
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify the cart will be empty after the checkout
Given the user completed the guest checkout process
When the user goes to review the cart after the order
Then the cart should be empty as the user made a purchase as a guest

title: Verify the user have SMS after the checkout
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify the user have SMS after the checkout
Given the user completed the guest checkout process
When the checkout is done
Then the user should get a confirmation SMS.

title: Parking option should be display for the guest checkout
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify the user gets a parking option
Given the user is on the ticket selection page
When the user chooses the ticket that has a parking option with it
Then the system should provide the parking option with the ticket
And it must appear on the checkout page and confirmation page and email

title: Anonymous users should be recognizable as an anonymous when they revisit the website without log in after the guest checkout process done
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify the user is recognizable when they revisit the website without login after the guest check out done
Given the user completed the guest checkout process
When the user revisits the website without logging in
Then the system should recognize the user as an anonymous guest with a session-based account

title: QR code payment plan is displayed in Guest checkout
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify Guest checkout is providing a QR code payment option
Given the user is on the guest checkout page
When users choose to pay via QR code payments methods 
Then the system should display the QR code for the payment scanning

title: Guest Checkout should have Seat Availability Alerts
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify Guest Checkout with Seat Availability Alerts 
Given the user on the ticket purchase page
When the user selects a game from the available options
And choose the number of tickets he/she wants to purchase
And some of the selected seats are out of stock
Then the user should receive an alert message about the limited seat availability

title: Seats with special attributes is displayed
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify the fan can see special attributes of seats
Given the user is on the ticket selection page 
When a user is about the select seat
Then the user should see the seats with special attributes

title: The confirmation email should contain the e-tickets with QR codes for the selected game
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify the confirmation email contains the e-tickets with QR codes for the selected game
Given the user completed the buying ticket process with guest checkout
When a user receives the confirmation email for the tickets
Then the ticket should contain the e-tickets with QR codes for the selected game

title: Inventory management should be aware every quantity of transaction
Guest checkout Anonymous analytics
User is able to purchase single game tickets as a Guest user
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the user can purchase single game tickets as a Guest user                                              
Given the user is on the ticket selection page                 
When a user is about the select seat                                             
Then the user should be able to select single-game tickets as a Guest user

title: Users are able to get error messages when they add invalid cards.
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the User can get an error message when they add an invalid card.                 
Given the user on the guest checkout process
When the user adds invalid payment card details
Then the user should get an error message

title: User is able to get prompt message if the card is declined
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the User is able to get the prompt message if the card is declined                 
Given the user on the guest checkout process
When the user's card is declined 
Then the user should get a prompt message

title: CVV is required fields
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that CVV is the required field.
Given the user on the guest checkout process
When user does not add the CVV number 
Then the user should not be able to complete the transaction

title: User completes the purchase using Apple pay/Google pay
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the user can complete the purchase using Apple pay/Google Pay
Given the user on the guest checkout process
When the user selects the payment method as Apple Pay/Google Pay
Then the user should be able to purchase transaction

title: The user can get the option to provide alternative contact method
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the user can get the option to provide an alternative contact method
Given the user selected the seat and go through the payment message 
When the user add the contact number 
Then the user should be able to provide an alternative contact method

title: User can add extra tickets if they want
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the User can add extra tickets if they want
Given the user is on the ticket selection page 
And user selects the seat and goes to the checkout page
When the user goes back to select an extra ticket 
Then the user should be able to select an extra ticket

title: User can remove individual or group of tickets from cart
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that User can remove individual or group of tickets from the cart 
Given user wants purchase ticket with guest checkout 
When user adds the tickets to the cart 
Then the user should be able to remove individual or groups of tickets from the cart

title: Users can click an accessible seat toggle
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the User can click the accessible seat toggle
Given the user is on the ticket selection page
When the user clicks the accessible seat toggle
Then the user should be able to click

title: Users can see the accessible seat after clicking the accessible seat toggle
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the user can achieve the accessible seat after clicking the accessible seat toggle
Given the user is on the ticket selection page 
When the user clicks the accessible seat toggle
Then the user should be able to see the accessible seat

title: What's your price range per ticket is visible and the slider is moveable?
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that 'What's your price range per ticket?'  is visible
Given the user is on the ticket selection page
When wants to play on the price range slider 
Then  'What's your price range per ticket?'  should be visible and the price range slider  should be moveable

title: 'Do you have a coupon code?' is displayed and coupon code is acceptable
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the user can add a coupon code and 'Do you have a coupon code?' is displayed
Given the user is on the ticket selection page
When a user wants to add a coupon code 
Then the user should enable add coupon code
And 'Do you have a coupon code?' should display

title: How many tickets? is visible and the User can increase and decrease the ticket number
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the User can increase and decrease the ticket number through the search option and 'How many tickets?' is visible
Given the user is on the ticket selection page
When the user wants to add a tickets number on the search option page
Then the user should be able to increase and decrease the number of tickets
And 'How many tickets?' should be visible

title: 'How would you like to find your tickets?' is displayed
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify 'How would you like to find your tickets?' is displayed
Given the user is on the ticket selection page 
When a user wants to select the ticket 
Then 'How would you like to find your tickets?' should display

title: Section and seat map button is clickable
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify Section and seat map button is clickable
Given the user is on the ticket selection page 
When a user wants to select tickets through the section and seat map 
Then Section and seat map buttons should be clickable

title: Buyer type is displayed once you click the section
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify the buyer type is displayed after clicking the section
Given the user is on the ticket selection page
When the user selects the tickets from the section and user clicks the section
And user clicks the dropdown section
Then the user should see the buyer type

title: The dropdown of buyer type from the section is clickable
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify user can click the dropdown on the section's buyer type
Given the user is on the ticket selection page
When a user wants to choose the number of tickets with desired buyer type
Then the user should enable to click the dropdown of the buyer type

title: The number of tickets is chosen able by the dropdown of buyer type from the section
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the user can choose the number of tickets through the dropdown of buyer type from the section
Given the user is on the ticket selection page
When a user wants to choose the number of tickets with desired buyer type
Then the user should enable to choose the number of tickets in the dropdown of the buyer type

title: "" Result  found changes according to the number of results
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify ""Number of Result change according to the number of results
Given the user is on the ticket selection page
When the user clicks the section
Then "" Result found should change according to the available section of the game

title: The accessible seat layer does not appear once you click the hide additional option
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the accessible seat layer appears once you click the hide additional option
Given the user is on the ticket selection page
When a user clicks the hide additional options
Then the accessible seat layer shouldn't appear

title: Add to cart is displayed
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that Add to Cart is displayed 
Given the user is on the ticket selection page
When a user selects the desired ticket
Then Add to Cart layer should display

title: Continue as the checkout button is clickable
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify Continue as checkout button 
Given a user is on the checkout page
When the user clicks continue as guest checkout 
Then continue as guest checkout should be clickable

title: Game information, stadium, date city, and state are displayed after selecting the ticket
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that Game information, stadium, date city, and state are displayed after selecting the ticket
Given a user is on the checkout page
When a user wants to purchase the desired ticket
Then  the game information, stadium, date city, and state should appear correctly on the top layer

title: The cart timer should display on the top layer
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the cart timer is displaying on the top layer
Given the user is on the checkout page
When a user wants to purchase the desired ticket
Then the cart timer should display

title: The checkout page should expire after cart time is over
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the page expires after cart time is over
Given the user is on the checkout page
When a user wants to purchase the desired ticket
And the cart timer gets over
Then guest checkout page should expire

title: Cart timer should start to decrease once the user goes through the checkout page
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the cart timer works correctly
Given the user select the ticket
When the user comes to the guest checkout page
Then cart time should start to work and decrease right away

title: Ticket protection is displayed
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that Ticket protection is displayed 
Given the user is on the checkout page
When the user wants to purchase the desired ticket
Then the user should be able to add ticket protection

title: The user should be able to click email and sms for message options
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the user can click the email and/or SMS from the message options
Given the user is on the checkout page
When a user wants to get a message about the purchased ticket
And the user clicks the email and/or SMS from the message options
Then the email and SMS checkmarks should be clickable

title: The user shouldn't enable to click place order without clicking I confirm that I am over the age of 15
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the user can complete the order without clicking I confirm that I am over the age of 15
Given the user is on the checkout page
When a user wants to complete the purchased ticket
Then the user must click I confirm that I am over the age of 15

title: The user is able to see the ticket on the ticket selection page on mobile
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the user can see the ticket on the ticket selection page on mobile
Given the user is on the ticket selection page on mobile
When a user is about to buy a ticket 
Then the user should be able to see available and upcoming game

title: The user is able to filter the ticket by date on mobile
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the user can filter the ticket by date on mobile
Given the user is on the ticket selection page 
When the user wants to filter the ticket by date to find the ticket easier
Then the user should be able to filter the ticket on mobile

title: The buy ticket button is clickable on mobile
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify The buy ticket button is clickable on mobile
Given the user is on the ticket selection page 
When a user wants to choose the ticket, he/she wants to buy
Then the user should enable to click the buy ticket button

title: The hide offer toggle is working as expected
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify The hide offer toggle is working as expected
Given the user is on the ticket selection page 
When a user clicks the hide offer toggle
Then the hide offer toggle should work as expected

title: Reset button should work as expected
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the reset button works as expected
Given the user is on the ticket selection page 
When a user wants to reset all the searches and chooses to have done
And the user clicks the reset button
Then the reset button should work as expected

title: The image of time boxing of chosen ticket is displayed
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify the image of time boxing of chosen ticket is displayed
Given the user is on the ticket selection page 
When a user wants to choose the seat of the desired game
Then the timeboxing image should display

title: User is enabled to choose a seat through the map seat
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the user enables to choose the seat through the map section
Given the user is on the ticket selection page 
When the user clicks the map to choose the seat
And the user clicks the section through the box office
Then the user should be able to choose the seat from the seat view

title: The ticket selected has the price of for each section
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the ticket selected has the price for each section
Given the user is on the ticket selection page
When the user chooses the game 
And the user clicks the section to choose a seat
Then the user should be able to see the price of each section under the price dropdown

title: Guest checkout option is displayed on mobile
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the guest checkout option is displayed on mobile 
Given the user is on the checkout page
When the user wants to purchase a ticket as a guest 
Then the user should see the guest checkout option

title: Continue as checkout button is clickable on mobile
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify Continue as checkout button on mobile
Given a user is on the checkout page
When the user clicks continue as guest checkout 
Then continue as guest checkout should be clickable

title: Checkout with creating account is displayed
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that Checkout with creating an account is displayed
Given the user is on the checkout page
When the user is about the purchased ticket
Then Checkout with creating an account should be displayed

title: Game information, stadium, date, city, and state are displayed after clicking on Continue as Guest button on mobile
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that Game information, stadium, date, city, and state are displayed after clicking on Continue as Guest button on mobile
Given the user is on the checkout page
When a user clicks the Continue as Guest button
And the user comes to the placing order page
Then the user should be able to see Game information, stadium, date, city, and state on the top layer

title: Click on the Edit button of the delivery method Verify that all the delivery options are displayed
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that when the user Click on the Edit button of the delivery method all the delivery options are displayed
Given the user is on the checkout page
When a user clicks on the edit button of the delivery method 
Then the user should be able to all the delivery options

title: The manage Tickets button should be displayed
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify Manage Tickets button should be displayed 
Given the user is on the confirmation ticket page 
When a user clicks the Manage Tickets button
Then a user should Manage Tickets button should be displayed

title: The cart page should be displayed on mobile
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify The cart page is displayed
Given the user is on the checkout page
When the user selects the cart 
Then the user should be able to see the cart

title: Verify that all the total due amount and service charges are correct
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that all the total due amounts and service charges are correct
Given is on the checkout page
When the user adds all payment details
Then the user should be able to see all the total due amounts and service charges are correct

title: Seat count, section and row should be displayed at the end
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that seat count, section, and row are displayed at the end 
Given is on the checkout page 
When the user adds all payment details
Then the user should be able to see seat count, section, and row

title: View from seat image is displayed on the confirmation page
custom_steps:
Scenario: Verify that the view from the seat image is displayed on the confirmation page
Given the user is on the confirmation page
When a user completes the purchasing ticket
Then the user should be able to see the view from the seat image

title: The general Parking option counter should plus as expected
custom_steps:
Scenario: The general Parking option counter should plus as expect

When a user clicks the general Parking option counter
Then the user should be able to increase the general Parking option counter

title: The VIP Parking option counter should plus  as expected
custom_steps:
Scenario: The VIP Parking option counter should plus as expect

When a user clicks the general Parking option counter
Then the user should be able to increase The VIP Parking option counter
